installation.script:
#!/bin/ash
# Redis Installation Script

apk add --no-cache curl

if [ -f /mnt/server/redis.conf ]; then
    echo "redis.conf already exists. Skipping download."
else
    echo "Downloading default redis.conf..."
    curl -o /mnt/server/redis.conf https://raw.githubusercontent.com/redis/redis/7.2/redis.conf

    echo "Configuring redis.conf for Pterodactyl environment..."
    # Disable daemonize (Docker needs foreground process)
    sed -i 's/^daemonize yes/daemonize no/' /mnt/server/redis.conf
    
    # Set binding to allow Docker networking (Security handled by Password + Docker Port mapping)
    sed -i 's/^bind 127.0.0.1 -::1/bind 0.0.0.0/' /mnt/server/redis.conf
    
    # Set working directory to container home
    sed -i 's/^dir .\//dir \/home\/container\//' /mnt/server/redis.conf
    
    # Disable protected mode (Relies on password)
    sed -i 's/^protected-mode yes/protected-mode no/' /mnt/server/redis.conf
    
    echo "Configuration complete."
fi
